input.sentences: we still had a few hours left before we had to leave .
we went to a local beach to collect shells .
we found a giant beached buoy and climbed on top of it .
there was a small house that was used for sheep that we took photos of .
on our way back we took one last picture for memories .
output.sentences: Sarah thought we should get an early start so we left at sunrise.
It was a chilly morning, but we stopped by the shore to collect some seashells.
During our time at the beach, we ran into a giant buoy, which we decided to take a picture on.
Here's Sarah messing around with the camera.
It was great morning, full of pictures, but most importantly, memories.
